name: Blompo's PalanQuest
description:
Guide Prince Blompo and his band of merry serfs in an RTS horde-battler!
Blompo gathers goodies and fights enemies from afar, using his squadron of minions to do his dirty work; but be careful not to stretch your troops too thin, you need them to be carrying your palanquin to get around!
Travel North in pursuit of a mysterious and assuredly decadent Gala; take care to outpace the setting sun and the perilous onset of Nightfall!
Build a squad of minions to your specifications at the shop inbetween stages

CONTROLS:
Left Click sends out Minions

Right Click recalls them in a radius

Spacebar flings your palanquin as a last-ditch effort; your servants will need to lift you off the ground again for you to regain control
